articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2011-2012)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1112 <- read_rds("clean_1112.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1112 <- clean_1112 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2011-2012)") plot_1112 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[107909,106338,105385,105245,70267],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2012-2013)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1213 <- read_rds("clean_1213.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1213 <- clean_1213 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2012-2013)") plot_1213 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[107097,105608,104662,104356,69874],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2013-2014)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1314 <- read_rds("clean_1314.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1314 <- clean_1314 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2013-2014)") plot_1314 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[105612,103848,102838,102809,68225],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2014-2015)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1415 <- read_rds("clean_1415.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1415 <- clean_1415 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2014-2015)") plot_1415 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[103870,102267,101431,101098,66847],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2015-2016)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1516 <- read_rds("clean_1516.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1516 <- clean_1516 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2015-2016)") plot_1516 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[107700,105456,105238,104020,67948],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2016-2017)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1617 <- read_rds("clean_1617.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1617 <- clean_1617 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2016-2017)") plot_1617 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[106093,104365,103725,102230,66675],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2017-2018)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1718 <- read_rds("clean_1718.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1718 <- clean_1718 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2017-2018)") plot_1718 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9],"base":[0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6],"y":[109191,107258,106112,104758,67204],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Secondary School Courses Ranked by Enrolment (2018-2019)
articles.contents:
Show code clean_1819 <- read_rds("clean_1819.rds") %>% group_by(Grade) %>% arrange(desc(Enrolment)) %>% slice(1:20) plot_1819 <- clean_1819 %>% ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(as.factor(`Course Code`), desc(Enrolment)), y = Enrolment, fill = `Pathway or Destination`, text = paste("Course Code:", `Course Code`, "\n", "Course Description:", `Course Description`, "\n", "# of Students Enrolled:", Enrolment, "\n", "Pathway/Destination:", `Pathway or Destination`))) + geom_col() + facet_wrap(~ Grade, scales = "free") + scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) + scale_x_discrete(labels = NULL, breaks = "", name = "") + ylim(0, 180000) + labs(title = "Top 20 Secondary School Courses by Number of Students Enrolled (2018-2019)") plot_1819 %>% ggplotly(tooltip = "text") %>% layout(width = 1000, height = 600, title = list(y = 0.97, yanchor = "bottom"), legend = list(bgcolor = "#FFFFF0", orientation = "v", yanchor = "top", y = 1)) {"x":{"data":[{"orientation":"v","width":[0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.9,0.899999999999999],"base":[0,0,0,0,0,0],"x":[2,3,4,5,6,20],"y":[112755,111020,109870,108335,68990,12445],"text":["Course Code: SNC1D

articles.title: Project Details
articles.contents:
Data Licence
All data used in this project is sourced from the Ontario Data Catalogue, and is available for public use under the Open Government Licence.
About Me
My name is George Pentchev. I am 17 years old and I attend White Oaks Secondary School in Oakville, Ontario, where I will be a senior this coming year. This project was possible due to my enrollment in Kanes Free High School Data Science Bootcamp. This project was the first fully independent project Ive created using R, and I had a lot of fun learning about R and how to use R tools, such as Distill (which was used to make this website). I hope to make more Data Science projects in the future!
Contact Info:
Email: 1pentchevgeo@hdsb.ca

articles.title: Performance of Top Secondary School Courses
articles.contents:
Show code

clean_diff <- read_rds("clean_diff.rds")

diff_plot <- clean_diff %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = rownames(clean_diff),
             group = 1)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `GLC2O`, color = "blue", text = paste("GLC2O"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `PPL1O`, color = "red", text = paste("PPL1O"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `SNC1D`, color = "orange", text = paste("SNC1D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `MPM1D`, color = "cyan", text = paste("MPM1D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `CGC1D`, color = "green", text = paste("CGC1D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `ENG1D`, color = "darkgoldenrod1", text = paste("ENG1D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `SNC2D`, color = "blueviolet", text = paste("SNC2D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `ENG2D`, color = "brown", text = paste("ENG2D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `MPM2D`, color = "black", text = paste("MPM2D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `CHC2D`, color = "darkorchid", text = paste("CHC2D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `ENG3U`, color = "darkseagreen", text = paste("ENG3U"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `ENG4U`, color = "deeppink", text = paste("ENG4U"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `MCR3U`, color = "coral", text = paste("MCR3U"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `FSF1D`, color = "chartreuse", text = paste("FSF1D"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `SCH3U`, color = "blue4", text = paste("SCH3U"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `SBI3U`, color = "darkgoldenrod", text = paste("SBI3U"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `MHF4U`, color = "burlywood", text = paste("MHF4U"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `ENG4C`, color = "darkolivegreen1", text = paste("ENG4C"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `MFM2P`, color = "mediumspringgreen", text = paste("MFM2P"))) +
  geom_line(aes(y = `PPL2O`, color = "palevioletred2", text = paste("PPL2O"))) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  labs(title = "Number of Students Joining/Leaving Courses (2011-2019)",
       x = "Year Difference",
       y = "Enrollment Difference")

diff_plot %>% 
  ggplotly(tooltip = "text")

articles.title: Course Enrolment in Secondary Schools
articles.contents:
The Data
The raw data for this project came from the Ontario Governments yearly releases of data for all secondary schools in the province. The data sets list different courses and include that courses code, description, pathway/destination, grade, and the number of students enrolled. Here is a sample of what the raw data looks like:
Raw Data for the 2018-2019 School Year


Show code

clean_1819 <- readr::read_rds("clean_1819.rds")

rmarkdown::paged_table(clean_1819)
